title: Paedophile surgeon, 58, who 'raped kids in twisted sex ring' found dead in cell
text:

A brain surgeon who allegedly raped kids as part of a child sex ring has been found dead in his jail cell.

James Kohut is understood to have taken his own life in Santa Cruz County Jail, California, US, reports say.

The 58-year-old, who had been in prison since 2017, was awaiting trial over dozens of child sex charges.

He was previously placed on suicide watch but had been taken off by the time his body was discovered on Sunday.

(Image: PIMA COUNTY JAIL)

Kohut and two nurses, one of whom was his girlfriend, were arrested in 2017 for allegedly running a child sex ring.

The group allegedly discussed having children for a 'taboo family', The Sun reports.

The neurosurgeon, Rashel Brandon and Emily Stephens all pleaded not guilty to child sex abuse charges.

Kohut previously told one woman he was in a relationship with from 1997 to 2000 that he wanted to have a child with her so they could abuse it, it is claimed.

He was charged with abusing children in 2003, 2014, 2016 and 2017, although prosecutors added that he had 'solicited victims for decades'.

His body was found on the same day that one of Britan's worst paedophiles, Richard Huckle, was dicovered dead in his prison cell.

Huckle was reportedly stabbed to death with a shank at HMP Full Sutton in East Yorkshire.

The 33-year-old, from Ashford, Kent, was jailed after confessing to 71 charges of vile sex abuse against children.

His campaign of terror against children, some as young as six months old, lasted for nine years and he had been ordered to spend at least 25 years behind bars.
description: James Kohut allegedly asked one of his former partners to have a child with him so they could abuse the baby
